homeHeader.title: Process, Relocate, and Ship Fast & Effortlessly—Manage All Your UAE Visa, Family, and Logistics Needs Under One Roof
homeHeader.description: Looking to relocate, sponsor your family, or expand your business in the UAE without the paperwork nightmare? At One Nexuz, we simplify every step of the visa and relocation journey, empowering you to amplify your market reach, bring your loved ones close, and build a high-impact workforce. Settle in effortlessly with dedicated support for housing, schooling, and transportation.

leftSection_5.title: How We Simplify Your UAE Visa Journey in 5 Steps

items.title: Book a Free Consultation

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What type of UAE visa is best for entrepreneurs and investors?
items.answer: The UAE offers a plethora of visa options, including the Golden Visa for 10+ years of residency, the investor visa for business owners, and freelancer permits for self-employed professionals. You can get in touch with our seasoned visa consultants to identify and secure the ideal visa type.

items.question: Will I need a sponsor to apply for a UAE visa?
items.answer: For most visa types, such as the employment or partner visa, you’ll require a sponsor. However, investor, green, Mainland, and Free Zone visas allow you to sponsor yourself through approved Free Zones or Government entities.

items.question: What documents do I need to secure my UAE visa?
items.answer: Generally, you’ll need a valid passport, passport-sized photographs, proof of employment or investment, medical fitness certificate, and additional documents, depending on the selected visa.

items.question: Does One Nexuz offer pet relocation services in the UAE?
items.answer: Yes, we offer end-to-end pet relocation solutions, including documentation, health certifications, flight bookings, transportation arrangement, and more!

items.question: What do UAE corporate relocation services include?
items.answer: Our corporate relocation services include comprehensive move planning, asset decommissioning and transportation, and comprehensive employee relocation support to ensure a seamless transition, minimal downtime, and maximum operational efficiency.
